name: Haitao Wang 0001
content: Haitao Wang's Homepage Haitao Wang (王海涛) Associate Professor Kahlert School of Computing The University of Utah 50 Central Campus Dr., RM 3190 Salt Lake City, UT 84112, USA Office: 3418 MEB (Merril Engineering Building) Email: haitao.wang (at) utah (dot) edu Brief Bio I am an Associate Professor in Kahlert School of Computing at the University of Utah. Before joining the school in 2022, I taught in the Department of Computer Science at Utah State University from 2012 to 2022. Prior to that, I served as a research assistant professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at University of Notre Dame from 2010 to 2012. I received my Ph.D degree in Computer Science from University of Notre Dame, Indiana, USA, in 2010. I received my M.S. degree in Computer Science from Fudan University in 2006 and B.S. degree in Mathematics from East China University of Science and Technology in 2003, both in Shanghai, China. Research Interests My research interests include computational geometry, algorithms and data structures, theoretical computer science, etc. Publications Curriculum Vitae Teaching Professional Activities
